title: DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 27 Community Health Officer Posts
description: The District Health Society Dahod (DHS Dahod) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 27 Community Health Officers, Medical Officers, and Audiologist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing, MBBS, BAMS, B.Sc, and Any Degree can apply for the DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here w...
